## The Dataset

Brief paragraph

```{r}
AirQuality <- read.csv("AirQualityUCI.csv")
head(AirQuality)

# Number of rows and columns
dim(AirQuality)

# Column names
colnames(AirQuality)

# Load libraries
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)

# Convert 'Date' column to date format
AirQuality$Date <- dmy(AirQuality$Date)
AirQuality$Date <- format(AirQuality$Date, "%Y-%m")

# Group by (NA values ignored)
AirQualityM <- summarise(
  group_by(AirQuality, Date),
  across(where(is.numeric), mean, na.rm = TRUE)
)

print(AirQualityM)
```
